data.Description (en): Genshiro is a unique money market with novel liquidation mechanics and portfolio margining. By using bailouts, no auctions are needed, and liquidity providers (bailsmen) supply liquidity in advance. Combined with on-chain risk modeling, our platform allows for use cases like borrowing, lending, stablecoin generation, and a decentralized exchange with margin trading and up to 20x leverage. Genshiro works with portfolios and not single collateral vaults. We bring all known DeFi use-cases to work in a beautiful and unified way. We're a one-stop DeFi shop on Kusama!
data.Description (zh): Genshiro是一个独特的货币市场，具有新颖的清算机制和组合抵押。通过使用紧急援助，不需要拍卖，就能提供很好的流动性。我们使用链上风险建模，允许平台借款、借贷、生成稳定币，以及去中心化的融资融券交易和高达20倍的杠杆。Genshiro能完成现在DeFi的所有功能。它将成为Kusama上第一个一站式一体化的DeFi商店。
